discourse_list.title: \xf0\x9f\xa7\xb0 Core Unit Tools #07: Ethereum Name Service (ENS)

content.content: 960×540 486 KB   Core Unit Tools #07: Ethereum Name Service (ENS) For the 7th episode of Core Unit Tools we’ll be joined by Makoto Inoue, one of the core developers at ENS (Ethereum Name Service), who will be talking about ENS’s use cases for Core Units and doing a live demo. As usual, @juan will be doing the hosting   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-09-10T15:30:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Where Zoom call Passcode: COREUNIT Alternatively, use this:  Find your local number: Zoom International Dial-in Numbers - Zoom Meeting ID: 829 4277 3725 Passcode: COREUNIT  Attn: @SES-Core-Unit, @gov-comms-core-unit, @GovAlpha-Core-Unit, @Growth-Core-Unit, @Content-Production, @MakerMikeP, @Coulter, @daif-core-unit, @Protocol-Engineering, @Oracles-Core-Unit, @Risk-Core-Unit, @Real-World-Finance, @twblack88, @flipflopflapdelegate, @planet_x, @PaperImperium, @monet-supply

Core Unit Tools - Episode #07  September 10th, 2021  Agenda   00:00: Intro with Juan Guillén  00:52: Presentation and Discussion with Makoto Inoue  49:33: Outro   Video https://youtu.be/pHL-XIkCgdc  Introduction  Juan Guillén  Agenda and Preamble 00:00  Hello to everyone. Welcome to Core Unit Tools episode #07. We are joined by Makoto Inoue from ENS. It is a very interesting project, and a lot of us are very big fans For other episodes of CUT, please check the forum.   Presentation  Makoto Inoue 00:52  1920×1136 153 KB   1914×1137 119 KB   1917×1140 182 KB   1920×1131 176 KB   1920×1135 265 KB   1920×1141 198 KB   1920×1142 217 KB   1920×1135 180 KB   1920×1138 177 KB   1920×1136 192 KB   1920×1140 243 KB   1920×1140 221 KB   1917×1124 143 KB   1920×1076 247 KB   1918×1074 268 KB   1920×1065 242 KB   1920×1076 231 KB   1916×1077 279 KB   1916×1070 271 KB   1918×1073 279 KB   1920×1054 278 KB   1920×1054 278 KB   1908×1052 281 KB   1917×1049 276 KB   1920×1070 281 KB   1920×1074 289 KB   1919×1069 265 KB   1920×1043 250 KB   1920×1063 266 KB   1913×1072 274 KB   1920×1069 290 KB   1920×1056 267 KB   ENS - FAQ   1920×1126 143 KB   1920×1132 210 KB   1920×1130 140 KB   1920×1136 175 KB   1920×1134 159 KB   1920×1129 210 KB   1915×1138 92.9 KB   1916×1114 211 KB   1918×1128 193 KB   1910×1127 208 KB   1908×1127 166 KB   1903×1125 187 KB   1920×1136 175 KB   ENS Integration   1919×1066 227 KB   1920×1062 150 KB   1920×1058 154 KB   Questions 38:37 - Planet_X: Is it possible to link an ENS to an NFT? Can you use the name NFT as the ENS name? 41:27 - Planet_X: Could you talk about the oracle change from MakerDao to Chainlink?   Closing Comment  Juan Guillén  Outro 49:33  Thank you a lot for coming, Makoto. This was great! Thank you to everyone for coming!   Credits   @gala produced this summary. Kunfu-po produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call, listed in the headers.
This full recording is now available on the MakerDAO Youtube Channel:      @Gala
